attributes.action: Have The West Midlands Police have a policy to not prosecute parents of FGM
attributes.background: A recent Tweet by The West Midlands Police admitted to a policy of not prosecuting parents of victims of FGM as it is not in the best interest of the child!

rejection.details:
Policing in the West Midlands is the responsibility of the local Police and Crime Commissioner (PCC), who is elected. You could contact the PCC directly to raise your concerns:

http://www.westmidlands-pcc.gov.uk/contact
